meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Alan Cummings Kathy Chappell Karen Kratzer Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #4424.

div.div: Game data retrieved from an alternate archive.

td.p: Alan Cummings, a teacher from Las Vegas, Nevada
Kathy Chappell, a writer from Burke, Virginia
Karen Kratzer, a tax accountant from Annapolis, Maryland (whose 2-day cash winnings total $42,701)

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'In cold water, changed often, turkey takes about 30 minutes per pound to do this (not drown)')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: In cold water, changed often, turkey takes about 30 minutes per pound to do this (not drown)

Cheers')
